channel.title: Dicing [667]
channel.description: Alright, how would I make a force chat be in "friends chat"? So it says "xxxx has rolled xx on the percentile dice." How do I do this? Probably a dumb question, I just can't figure it out.. :s Right now I can only make it say "I have rolled xx on the percentile dice" overhead.. I don't know how to make it in friends chat. Please help?

item.title: Dicing [667]
item.dc:creator: @Pest Pest
item.description:
@Pest wrote:

Alright, how would I make a force chat be in “friends chat”?
So it says “xxxx has rolled xx on the percentile dice.” How do I do this? Probably a dumb question, I just can’t figure it out… :s
Right now I can only make it say “I have rolled xx on the percentile dice” overhead… I don’t know how to make it in friends chat. Please help?
